department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: E6MON-230001 - RFSO - Remedial/Repair/Optimization Kitchen Products PERIOD 2
description: The procurement for this Tendering Request is for the provision and delivery of several disposable kitchen products and others on an as and when needed basis to all federal departments and ministries located in the Province of Quebec.
full_summary:
**E6MON-230001 - Request for Standing Offer (RMSO) - Kitchen Products**
================================================================================================

**Reference Information**
------------------------

*   **Title (English)/Titre (French)**: E6MON-230001 - Request for Standing Offer (RMSO) - Kitchen Products
*   **Reference Number (English)/Numéro de référence (French)**: WS3981001474-Doc4326985597
*   **Publication Date (English)/Date de publication (French)**: December 1, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date (English)/Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres (French)**: December 20, 2023, at 14:00 (EST)

**Tender Details**
------------------

*   **Contract Number (English)/N umber de Contrat (French)**: Not Applicable (Standing Offer)
*   **Contract Status (English)/Statut du contrat (French)**: The tender has expired, and the RMSO will be awarded to the supplier who meets the criteria and offers a competitive price.
*   **Goods/Services Provided (English)/Fournitures/Services Offerts (French)**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting for the provision and delivery of several disposable kitchen products on an "as and when needed" basis to all federal departments and ministries located in the Province of Quebec.

**Industry Classification**
---------------------------

*   **UNSPSC categories**: 48101800, 52150000, 52152000, 52152100
*   **UNSPSC Description (English/French)**: Cookware and kitchen tools; Domestic kitchenware and kitchen supplies; Domestic dishes and servingware and storage containers; Domestic drinkware

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

*   This tender is open to tenderers who meet the requirements as per the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

*   Julie Carbonneau (SPAC/PSPC), Environment and Health Sciences Centre
